text: Ara tara allah‌ra jan'ya nirdista kare sasyaksetra o pasupalana theke ya tini utpadana karechena tara eka ansa, ebam bale -- ''e'i hacche allah‌ra jan'ya’’ -- tadera dharananuyayi, -- ''ara e'i hacche amadera ansidebatadera jan'ya.’’ Tarapara ya tadera ansidebatadera jan'ya ta allah‌ra kache paumche na, ara ya allah‌ra jan'ya ta peche yamya tadera ansidebatadera kache. Ki nikrsta ya tara sid'dhanta kare
